other_tests.findings: Mild dependent and subsegmental atelectasis; appendix is dilated and fluid-filled with hyperemic walls; disruption of the appendiceal wall with extraluminal air; developing fluid collection measuring approximately 3.7 x 2.5 x 4.9 cm; wall thickening affecting terminal ileum and cecum; prominent adjacent lymph nodes; mild circumferential wall thickening of the distal esophageal wall.
